question:
Which of the following matches of chief authorities of the Maratha Judicial system (Criminal Cases) with their respective areas is/ are correct?
1. Patel- Village
2. Mamlatdar- District
3. Sarsubedar- Province
4. Nyayadhish- Headquarter
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Chief authorities of Maratha Judicial system and their respective areas for the criminal cases- Nyayadhish and Peshwa- Headquarter, Sarsubedar- Province, Mamlatdar- District, Patel- Village. There was no conventional method of trial of the accused person.
